qas.question: When was widescreen HDTV transmission modes formally adopted?

context: Since the formal adoption of <b4_0>digital video broadcasting's<b4_0/> (DVB) widescreen HDTV transmission modes in the <a0_0><b5_0>early 2000s<b5_0/><a0_0/>; the 525-line NTSC (and <a2_0><b7_0>PAL-M<b7_0/><a2_0/>) systems, as well as the European 625-line PAL and <a1_0><b6_0>SECAM systems<b6_0/><a1_0/>, are now regarded as <a3_0><b8_0>standard definition television systems<b8_0/><a3_0/>.
